children.value: Do not edit manually. Update docstrings in the source code instead.
Main controller for Slide Forge bidirectional conversions.
Supports conversions between LaTeX Beamer, PowerPoint, and other presentation formats.
convert_file(self, input_file: str, output_file: str, **kwargs) -> bool
convert_string(self, content: str, output_file: str, source_format: str, **kwargs) -> bool
Content mapper for bidirectional format conversions.
can_convert(self, source_format: str, target_format: str) -> bool
Builder for PowerPoint presentations using python-pptx.

Conversion_Options(theme: str = 'default', preserve_colors: bool = True, preserve_fonts: bool = True, preserve_layouts: bool = True, include_images: bool = True, include_notes: bool = False, verbose: bool = False, output_format: Optional[str] = None, custom_settings: Dict[str, Any] = <factory>) -> None
Element_Type(value, names=None, *, module=None, qualname=None, type=None, start=1, boundary=None)
Universal element types that exist across formats.
Formatting(value, names=None, *, module=None, qualname=None, type=None, start=1, boundary=None)
Layout_Type(value, names=None, *, module=None, qualname=None, type=None, start=1, boundary=None)

Metadata(title: Optional[str] = None, author: Optional[str] = None, date: Optional[str] = None, institution: Optional[str] = None, subject: Optional[str] = None, keywords: List[str] = <factory>, language: Optional[str] = None, version: Optional[str] = None, created_date: Optional[str] = None, modified_date: Optional[str] = None, custom_properties: Dict[str, Any] = <factory>) -> None
Position(x: float, y: float, width: Optional[float] = None, height: Optional[float] = None) -> None
Size(width: float, height: float, scale: Optional[float] = None) -> None

Text_Content(text: str, formatting: List[slideforge.models.universal.Formatting] = <factory>, font_size: Optional[str] = None, font_color: Optional[str] = None, font_family: Optional[str] = None) -> None

Universal_Document(metadata: slideforge.models.universal.Metadata = <factory>, frames: List[slideforge.models.universal.Universal_Frame] = <factory>, source_format: Optional[str] = None, source_path: Optional[pathlib.Path] = None, global_settings: Dict[str, Any] = <factory>) -> None

Universal_Element(element_type: slideforge.models.universal.Element_Type, content: Union[str, slideforge.models.universal.Text_Content, Dict[str, Any]], position: Optional[slideforge.models.universal.Position] = None, size: Optional[slideforge.models.universal.Size] = None, level: int = 0, style: Dict[str, Any] = <factory>, metadata: Dict[str, Any] = <factory>) -> None
Universal element that can represent content from any format.

Universal_Frame(frame_number: int, title: Optional[str] = None, subtitle: Optional[str] = None, elements: List[slideforge.models.universal.Universal_Element] = <factory>, layout: slideforge.models.universal.Layout_Type = <Layout_Type.TITLE_AND_CONTENT: 'title_and_content'>, background_color: Optional[str] = None, notes: Optional[str] = None, metadata: Dict[str, Any] = <factory>) -> None

create_image_element(image_path: str, caption: str = None, position: slideforge.models.universal.Position = None, size: slideforge.models.universal.Size = None) -> slideforge.models.universal.Universal_Element

create_text_element(text: str, element_type: slideforge.models.universal.Element_Type = <Element_Type.TEXT: 'text'>, formatting: List[slideforge.models.universal.Formatting] = None) -> slideforge.models.universal.Universal_Element
Create a text element with optional formatting.
BuilderError(message: str, slide_number: int = None, operation: str = None, output_format: str = None)
Error raised during building of output files.
ConfigurationError(message: str, config_key: str = None, config_value: str = None)
Error raised due to configuration issues.
ConversionError(message: str, source_file: str = None, target_file: str = None, stage: str = None)
Error raised during the conversion process.
MappingError(message: str, element_type: str = None, source_format: str = None, target_format: str = None)
Error raised during content mapping between formats.
ParseError(message: str, line_number: int = None, file_path: str = None, latex_snippet: str = None)
Error raised during parsing of input files.
Base exception for all Slide Forge errors.
UnsupportedFormatError(message: str, format_name: str = None, operation: str = None)
Error raised when trying to use an unsupported format.
ValidationError(message: str, field: str = None, value: str = None)
Error raised during validation of inputs or outputs.
Perform the conversion with given arguments
Validate input and output file paths
